Tibbles

as_tibble as_tibble.tbl_df as_tibble.data.frame as_tibble.list as_tibble.matrix as_tibble.table as_tibble.NULL as_tibble.default as.tibble as_data_frame

Coerce lists and matrices to data frames.

is.tibble is_tibble

Test if the object is a tibble.

tibble tibble_ data_frame data_frame_

Build a data frame or list.

tribble frame_data

Row-wise tibble creation

enframe deframe

Converting atomic vectors to data frames, and vice versa

all_equal all.equal.tbl_df

Flexible equality comparison for data frames.

has_name

Convenience function to check presence of a named element

Manipulation

add_row

Add rows to a data frame

add_column

Add columns to a data frame

repair_names

Repair object names.

Helpers

glimpse

Get a glimpse of your data.

rownames has_rownames remove_rownames rownames_to_column column_to_rownames

Tools for working with row names

Vectors, matrices, and lists

enframe deframe

Converting atomic vectors to data frames, and vice versa

lst lst_

Build a list

as_tibble as_tibble.tbl_df as_tibble.data.frame as_tibble.list as_tibble.matrix as_tibble.table as_tibble.NULL as_tibble.default as.tibble as_data_frame

Coerce lists and matrices to data frames.

frame_matrix

Row-wise matrix creation
